Springs First Grader working on RoyGBiv birds

span.style: background-image: url('/userfiles/292/my files/speak up save lives 2.png?id=3041');

span.p: Are you interested in sharing your favorite memory of Senior Year and your Future plans?
If so, please submit information to be posted on the HHS Social Media and Pep Club social media pages. Any picture will do, you can use a senior picture or one you took on your own.
All posts in terms of photos and information must be school appropriate. If we have any questions we will reach out to you. The future plans must under 175 words.

You must be logged in under your Howland School Student account for the link to work and you can only submit the form once. Filling out the form is equivalent to giving HHS permission to post the information you provide to our School Social Media and Website.

The Paw Pantry is in Need of Donations

span.p: Our Paw Pantry is very low on certain items. Please consider donating any of the items below. You can drop off your donations at HHS in the U on Tue. & Thur. from 8:00 to 12:00. Thank you for helping those in need! If you would like to make a monetary donation please make your check out to Howland Local Schools and in the memo write: Paw Pantry. Mail to: Howland High School, 200 Shaffer Dr., Warren, OH 44484, attn: Gina Camelli

p.br:
Spaghetti sauce
Spaghetti
Instant oatmeal
Cereal
Complete pancake mix
Syrup
Jelly
Soup
Microwavable mac and Cheese
Ramen noodles
Other non-perishable food items

Colored pencils
Markers
Folders with pockets with or without prongs

span.p: This is the time of year when we see an increase in children who are coughing, sneezing and exhibiting other symptoms, typical during cold and flu season. With news of the spread of the “coronavirus”, we too see a heightened sense of concern about our own preparedness should we see cases closer to home.
Although we are being assured that Americans have a low risk of exposure to the virus, we are taking a number of precautions.

a.title: Click to read more about: Updated Coronavirus Information

div.a: Read More about Updated Coronavirus Information

span.b: Per the Governor’s directive to close Ohio Schools for a period of at least three weeks, the hours for pick up/drop off of open enrollment applications has been modified to the hours of 8:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m., at the administration offices, Tuesdays and Thursdays through March 31, 2020.

a.title: Click to read more about: Open Enrollment Information

div.a: Read More about Open Enrollment Information

span.strong: Per The Governor’s directive to close Ohio Schools for a period of at least three weeks, Howland’s Kindergarten registration is postponed at this time. Please watch our website for updates!

span.span: Listed below are links to our strategic plans for specific school years. Each page has a brief description of the plan as well as a link to a PowerPoint. Please take the time to visit these pages to see where we have been, where we are, and where we want to go.
